channel.title: How to create a Hamachi Server!
channel.description:
[size=10pt][center][u]How To Create A Hamachi Server[/u][/center]
[i]Difficulty: 1/10 Its Easy Unless your really freakin retarted.
Purpose: How to create your own server but hamachi style.
Created By: I Sis I[/i]
[u]Step 1: Downloading Hamachi[/u]
Go to hamachi.cc and you'll see this: Hit Download Now:
[img]http://img.draynor.net/uploads/ham pic80ad9.bmp[/img]
Skip Registering
[img]http://img.draynor.net/uploads/hampic27e911.bmp[/img] Hit Download:
[img]http://img.draynor.net/uploads/hampic3ebd35.bmp[/img]
Hit Save
[img]http://img.draynor.net/uploads/ham48cdb8.bmp[/img]
[i]Step 2: Get a server[/i]
Go to moparisthebest.com/smf go to downloads and hit dowmload list. You'll see alot of servers test some out and find one to your need.
Save the file, and extract it to a folder. Then edit it, save it, compile it, rune your server!
Step 3: Make a network:
Run your hamachi.
Hit this button: [img]http://img.draynor.net/uploads/hamw10dafb.bmp[/img]
Then hit Create Network:
[img]http://img.draynor.net/uploads/hamw207804.bmp[/img]
Create a name for your server as your network name, and then a password.
[img]http://img.draynor.net/uploads/hamw36c88c.bmp[/img]
And thats how you do it!
100% me I SiS I owner of lostcityscape1-5 pass: lost
Please Post If Help You Out!

item.description:
@I_SiS_I wrote:

[size=10pt][center]How To Create A Hamachi Server[/center]

[i]Difficulty: 1/10 Its Easy Unless your really freakin retarted.

Purpose: How to create your own server but hamachi style.

Created By: I Sis I[/i]

Step 1: Downloading Hamachi

Go to hamachi.cc and you’ll see this:
Hit Download Now:

Skip Registering


Hit Download:

Hit Save

Step 2: Get a server

Go to moparisthebest.com/smf go to downloads and hit dowmload list. You’ll see alot of servers test some out and find one to your need.

Save the file, and extract it to a folder. Then edit it, save it, compile it, rune your server!

Step 3: Make a network:

Run your hamachi.

Hit this button:

Then hit Create Network:

Create a name for your server as your network name, and then a password.

And thats how you do it!
